name: Valley of the Ancient - UE5 demo
name_original: Valley of the Ancient - UE5 demo
description:
'Valley of the Ancient' is the Unreal Engine 5 demo, entirely created and released by Epic Games, for use with Unreal Engine only.

I have packaged and compiled it, made some little modifications and added some extra functions, but the main purpose of this is to make it accesible to gamers, not limiting it to Unreal developers, so anyone with a modern Windows PC should be able to run and try it.

Some gameplay keys:

1, 2, 3, 4 = keys to select visual quality (1 is highest and default, 4 is lowest). Level 3 offers a great quality/performance ratio.

8 and 9 = a different technique of visual quality switch. Both are low quality modes.

Escape button = quit/exit the game.

Minimum requirements (aprox):

No installation needed; just download it, decompress and execute the EXE file.

DirectX12 compatible GPU, GTX 1060 6GB or higher, 8GB RAM, 4-core CPU and 23GB disk space.

It's still a MEGA download link, until itch.io allows me to directly upload the 23GB file here.
